Rectangle $ ABCD$ has $ AB=8$ and $ BC=6$.  Point $ M$ is the midpoint of diagonal $ \overline{AC}$, and E is on $ \overline{AB}$ with $ \overline{ME}\perp\overline{AC}$.  What is the area of $ \triangle AME$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{65}{8} \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{25}{3} \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 9 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{75}{8} \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ \frac{85}{8}$
